CustomField.description: The region this account is located in for the API calls to target the correct region URL endpoint. For example app1, hipaa1, emea1, emea4, app9, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The region this account is located in for the API calls to target the correct region URL endpoint. For example app1, hipaa1, emea1, emea4, app9, etc.
CustomField.label: Region
